channel.title: Toner on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Toner on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Ink-Stained Headlines
item.description: [big]You know what’s a terrible racket? Printer ink. Driven up by artificial markets and complex, incompatible cartridge systems, printers have become one of the most depressing parts of any computing experience—especially if you own one at home.[/big] And they bring out the worst behavior in companies. Hewlett-Packard last year had a scandal on its hands after it added digital rights management to its printers, then turned it off after people complained.
